articles.author: Paula Newton, CNN
articles.title: Canadian man who used rental van to run down pedestrians found guilty of first-degree murder
articles.description: A Canadian judge has ruled that a man who admitted to renting a van to run down and kill pedestrians in 2018 is guilty on 10 counts of first-degree murder and 16 counts of attempted murder.

articles.title: Chicago mayor unveils changes to search warrant policy in the fallout of a botched raid on social worker's home
